definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)

sentences.english: If she tries to tell me what to do again, I'll tell her where to get off.
sentences.chinese: 要是她再想叫我做这做那，我会叫她识相点儿。

definition: to have a clear view of things/to adapt to circumstances
fail to appreciate sb's kindness/not know how to appreciate favors
to refuse a toast only to be forced to drink a forfeit/fig. to hesitate to do sth until forced to do even more
pinyin: jing4 jiu3 bu4 chi1 chi1 fa2 jiu3

definition: unable to differentiate good from bad (idiom)/not to know what's good for one/unable to recognize others' good intentions
unable to tell good from bad (idiom)/undiscriminating
to show deference or praise publicly
to show no understanding of the times (idiom); cannot adapt to current circumstances/not amenable to reason
hands tied and waiting to be captured
